SEARCH
Package com.financial.entries

Class BudgetRevenue

java.lang.Object
com.financial.entries.BudgetEntry
com.financial.entries.BudgetRevenue
All Implemented Interfaces:
BudgetRevenueLogic
Direct Known Subclasses:
PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue, RegularBudgetRevenue
public class BudgetRevenue extends BudgetEntry implements BudgetRevenueLogic
The base class for all budget revenue entries in the system.

This class serves as the central point for aggregating financial data from multiple sources (Regular and Public Investment). It maintains a global registry of all revenue entries and provides fundamental logic for hierarchical levels, code-based sorting, and duplicate merging.

  • Constructor Details

    • BudgetRevenue

      public BudgetRevenue(String code, String description, String category, long amount)
      Basic constructor for general budget entries.
      Parameters:
      code - the unique financial code
      description - a brief description of the entry
      category - the financial category
      amount - the total financial amount

    • BudgetRevenue

      public BudgetRevenue(String code, String description, String category, long regularAmount, long publicInvestmentAmount, long amount)
      Detailed constructor for consolidated budget revenues. Automatically registers the instance in the global static registry.
      Parameters:
      code - the unique financial code
      description - a brief description
      category - the financial category
      regularAmount - the amount from regular resources
      publicInvestmentAmount - the amount from investment resources
      amount - the total combined amount

  • Method Details

    • sortBudgetRevenuesByCode

      public static void sortBudgetRevenuesByCode()
      Sorts the global revenue list alphabetically by code. This is a prerequisite for the duplicate filtering process.

    • filterBudgetRevenues

      public static void filterBudgetRevenues()
      Merges duplicate revenue entries in the global registry.

      When multiple objects share the same code (e.g., from different data inputs), their amounts are summed into a single consolidated object to ensure budget integrity.

    • getAllBudgetRevenues

      public static ArrayList<BudgetRevenue> getAllBudgetRevenues()
      Returns the global list of all consolidated budget revenues.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all instances

    • getMainBudgetRevenues

      public static ArrayList<BudgetRevenue> getMainBudgetRevenues()
      Retrieves top-level (2-digit code) revenues.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of main budget categories

      Returns:

    • calculateSum

      public static long calculateSum()
      Calculates the total sum of all main budget categories.
      Returns:
      the total budget sum

    • getLevelOfHierarchy

      public int getLevelOfHierarchy()
      Determines the hierarchical level of the entry based on the length of its code.
      • Level 1: 2 digits (e.g., "11")
      • Level 2: 3 digits
      • Level 3: 5 digits
      • Level 4: 7 digits
      • Level 5: 10 digits
      Returns:
      the level index (1-5), or 0 for unknown lengths

    • getAboveLevelSuperCategory
